title: Portfolio website implementation from project plan
description: Track build, content, quality, and launch activities defined in PORTFOLIO_PLAN.md, explicitly using the shadcn/ui component system, design tokens, and shadcn/ui MCP-driven component workflow.

Ensure sequencing follows task dependencies and only close issues from the main repo Beads DB.

title: Set up Next.js + TypeScript project scaffold
description: Bootstrap project structure (src/public/config), base layout, sticky navigation, and visual design tokens aligned with plan.

notes: Resume deliverable must include downloadable PDF and concise web summary, surfaced via shadcn/ui button/card/link patterns and clear CTA placement in nav/home/contact contexts.

notes: Analytics integration must be privacy-friendly and track key CTA events per plan. Ensure instrumentation points correspond to shadcn/ui CTA components and do not degrade performance/accessibility.

title: Implement SEO and social metadata
description: Configure titles, descriptions, Open Graph images, sitemap, and robots.txt.
notes: SEO/social task must implement per-page metadata, Open Graph/Twitter images, sitemap, and robots. Verify metadata coverage for shadcn/ui-rendered pages and project/blog routes.

title: Performance and accessibility hardening pass
description: Address semantic HTML, focus states, alt text, code-splitting, and image optimization.
notes: Hardening pass must enforce semantic HTML, keyboard focus visibility, alt text, image optimization, and code-splitting. Audit shadcn/ui component usage for accessibility and responsive behavior.

title: Author and publish at least 3 polished case studies
description: Create three complete project writeups in content/projects following the case study template.
notes: Case-study publishing task must produce at least 3 polished project writeups in the defined template and ensure each page uses consistent shadcn/ui presentation (cards/sections/CTA blocks).

title: Launch readiness validation and release
description: Run launch checklist, verify Lighthouse targets >90, test contact flow, and deploy.
notes: Launch readiness must validate Lighthouse >90 categories, contact flow, resume/download links, OG cards, and deployment readiness. Confirm all prior shadcn/ui + MCP standards are satisfied before close.

notes: Ran npm run build, deployed dist/ via netlify deploy, removed @netlify/plugin-nextjs, and revalidated coverage (npm run coverage).

title: Verify Netlify auto-build pipeline
description: Confirm the Netlify project abigael-awino-portfolio is connected to this repo so GitHub pushes trigger the build/publish flow automatically; netlify.toml already defines npm run build and dist/ as publish dir. Double-check webhook/CI integration and note the log URL above.
notes: Deploy log: https://app.netlify.com/projects/abigael-awino-portfolio/deploys/698828a9940a8a635316a34c. Monitor webhook health and future deploy success.

title: Feed Ralph queue with follow-up beads

notes: Add new beads whenever a new requirement surfaces so Ralph always has next work to execute.

title: Configure CI quality gates and scripts

notes: CI gates must validate shadcn/ui-based app changes: lint, type-check, tests, build, and formatting. Include checks that fail on broken component imports/tokens and ensure PR preview workflow aligns with plan.

description: Create content directories, frontmatter schema, and automatic index generation for projects and blog posts.
notes: MDX pipeline must support project/blog schemas exactly from plan (content/projects and content/blog) and render through shared shadcn/ui typography/components. Use MCP to standardize rendered content blocks.

title: Build project grid with filtering and card UI
description: Implement Projects page with tag filters (ML, analytics, visualization, NLP, time series) and case study CTA cards.
notes: Projects grid must use shadcn/ui Card + filter controls with tags (ML, analytics, visualization, NLP, time series). Implement responsive cards for 360-414px and keep CTA label as 'Read case study'.

title: Build reusable project case study template
description: Create case study layout sections: summary, data, methods, results, reproducibility, and reflection.
notes: Case study template must implement sections from plan (Summary, Data, Methods, Results, Reproducibility, Reflection) with reusable shadcn/ui layout primitives and typography styles generated/updated via MCP.

title: Implement Home page with value proposition and key CTAs

notes: Home page must deliver value proposition + featured project + resume/GitHub/LinkedIn CTAs using shadcn/ui components (hero structure, buttons, cards). Verify mobile-first behavior and sticky navigation interaction.

title: Implement About page with bio and toolkit
description: Add concise bio, strengths, toolkit, and optional speaking/publication section.
notes: About page must include short bio, strengths, toolkit, optional speaking/publications using shadcn/ui typography and list/card patterns. Ensure semantic headings and accessibility from the plan.

title: Implement Blog index and post pages
description: Render blog list and MDX post pages with reading time metadata.
notes: Blog index and post pages must render MDX with readingTime and consistent shadcn/ui typographic rhythm. Use MCP-selected components for callouts/code/metadata blocks where needed.

title: Implement Contact page with spam protection

notes: Contact page must implement form + spam protection (honeypot/Recaptcha) and privacy note from plan, using shadcn/ui form controls and validation states with accessible labels and focus handling.

title: Verify Lighthouse scores >90 across all pages
